resources.string: 获取粉丝信息出现了点错误
你需要关注\n%1$s\n之后才可以发送私信. 请选择关注类型:
升级至高级关注，只要每月1.99美金，就可以获得下列特权:

See hero's open positions
See hero's activity on your timeline
Unlimited private messageing
Real-time push notification of hero's activity
See hero\'s open positions\nSee hero\'s activity on your timeline\nLimited private messageing
